error.missingInput: Please enter your username and password.

intro.first: Management of private eBay sales assists in recording revenues, profits, and customer data. Supported features include exporting reports and statistics, insight into detailed order data, and a map view of all customer locations.
intro.second: New orders can be recorded quickly through the form. Reports and statistics help keep track of sales and profits and are automatically generated by the system. A filterable list of all orders makes it easier to manage and track sales, and the map view visualizes orders by location.
